title: Zombie
summaries: The Zombie is a common pre-Hardmode surface enemy that appears at night, and is a primary reason newer players will want to build a shelter before night arrives. Along with Demon Eyes, they are generally among the first nighttime enemies a player will encounter, as they appear in areas a player first spawns.

Zombies follow the Fighter AI and walk towards the player, dealing damage on contact. They can jump and navigate platforms. Zombies will seem to hit closed doors in their path repeatedly, though most of them cannot open doors unless it is a Blood Moon (any regular and Blood Zombies(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) that spawn during which are all able to open doors); Spore Zombies and Maggot Zombies(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) can open doors at any time.

In Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), Armed Zombies that carry disembodied arms will spawn. When they are close to the player, they will stop to perform a special "claw attack" which extends their attack range and deals more damage to the player. These arm-wielding zombies are unable to open or interact with doors at any time. The Armed Zombie Statue can spawn regular Armed Zombies in any difficulty.
